creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a Black couple on the floor in front of a console TV with a lamp and a smaller TV on top of it; man lying on his side, wearing a patterned shirt; woman wearing a dark colored outfit and a patterned headscarf leans over man
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: TV, Bedroom, Berkeley, CA
